languages.text: "Удручающе мало, Ваша Светлость — все мое внимание направлено на отслеживание активности ксеносов. Уверен, что господин ван Калокс расскажет вам об этих еретиках значительно больше, чем я".

traits.locale_text: "Удручающе мало, Ваше Сиятельство — все мое внимание направлено на отслеживание активности ксеносов. Уверен, что господин Ван Калокс расскажет вам об этих еретиках значительно больше, чем я".

languages.text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."
languages.original_text: "Удручающе мало, Ваша Светлость — все мое внимание направлено на отслеживание активности ксеносов. Уверен, что господин ван Калокс расскажет вам об этих еретиках значительно больше, чем я".

traits.locale_text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about these heretics than I."

"My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about these heretics than I."

"My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

"My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

"My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

languages.text: “我对他们的了解有限，大人。我所有的注意力，都集中在追踪异形的活动上。我相信，冯·卡洛克斯大师可以告诉您那些异端分子的情况，他对那群邪教徒的了解比我要多得多。”
languages.original_text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

traits.locale_text: “我对他们的了解有限，大人。我所有的注意力，都集中在追踪异形的活动上。我相信，冯·卡洛克斯大师可以告诉您那些异端分子的情况，他对那群邪教徒的了解比我要多得多。”

languages.text: «Debo admitir que mis conocimientos al respecto son lamentablemente limitados, mi{mf|lord|lady}. He centrado toda mi atención en rastrear las actividades xenos. Seguramente el maestro van Calox pueda contarle mucho más sobre esos herejes que yo».
languages.original_text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

traits.locale_text: «Debo admitir que mis conocimientos al respecto son lamentablemente limitados, mi{mf|lord|lady}. He centrado toda mi atención en rastrear las actividades xenos. Seguramente el maestro van Calox pueda contarle mucho más sobre esos herejes que yo».

languages.text: 「情けないことに、私が知ることはごくわずかなのです、陛下。私は異種族の活動の追跡に全神経を注いでおりますゆえ。ヴァン・カロックス様であれば、あの異端者について私よりはるかに詳しいお話ができるはずです」
languages.original_text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

traits.locale_text: 「情けないことに、私が知ることはごくわずかなのです、陛下。私は異種族の活動の追跡に全神経を注いでおりますゆえ。ヴァン・カロックス様であれば、あの異端者について私よりはるかに詳しいお話ができるはずです」

languages.text: "Meine Kenntnisse darüber sind erschreckend begrenzt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} – meine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit galt den Aktivitäten der Xenos. Meister van Calox kann Euch mit Sicherheit viel mehr über diese Ketzer erzählen als ich."
languages.original_text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Kenntnisse darüber sind erschreckend begrenzt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} – meine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit galt den Aktivitäten der Xenos. Meister van Calox kann Euch mit Sicherheit viel mehr über diese Ketzer erzählen als ich."

languages.text: « Hélas, mes connaissances sur le sujet sont très limitées, Votre Seigneurie. J'avoue concentrer toute mon attention sur les activités xénos. Mais je suis sûr que maître van Calox pourra vous en dire plus que moi sur ces hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

traits.locale_text: « Hélas, mes connaissances sur le sujet sont très limitées, Votre Seigneurie. J'avoue concentrer toute mon attention sur les activités xénos. Mais je suis sûr que maître van Calox pourra vous en dire plus que moi sur ces hérétiques. »

languages.text: "Bilgim elim derecede kısıtlı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tüm dikkatimi zeno faaliyetlerine yoğunlaştırdım. Eminim Üstat van Calox, o kâfirler hakkında size benden daha fazla bilgi verecektir."
languages.original_text: "My knowledge is deplorably limited, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — all my attention has been focused on tracking xenos activity. I'm certain that Master van Calox can tell you much more about those heretics than I."

traits.locale_text: "Bilgim elim derecede kısıtlı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tüm dikkatimi zeno faaliyetlerine yoğunlaştırmıştım. Eminim Üstat van Calox size o kâfirler hakkında benden daha fazla bilgi verebilir."
